business.headline: What is Google tax?The tax is expected to be scrapped from April 1, 2025, as part of amendments to the Finance Bill.

Sensex down over 700 points from day's high. Why stock market turned volatile?Stock market today: At around 11:45 am, the S&P BSE Sensex was down 51.05 points to 77,933.33 and the NSE Nifty50 declined 17.85 points to trade at 23,640.50.

India likely to remove 6% Google tax from April 1, tech giants to benefitThe Equalisation Levy know as 'Google Tax' was introduced in 2016 to tax payments made by Indian businesses to foreign companies for digital advertising services.

UltraTech Cement shares surge 4% in early trade today. Here's whyGlobal brokerage firm UBS has shared a fresh view on India's cement sector and upgraded stocks such as UltraTech Cement and Ambuja Cement.
Sensex jumps 700 points in early trade. 5 key things to know todayThe S&P BSE was up 739.51 points to 78,723.89 at 10.01 am, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 196 points to 23,854.35.

TCS, HCLTech, Infosys, Wipro: Why IT stocks are rising todayShares of IT major Infosys jumped over 2%, while Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) shares were trading over 1.5% higher on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). HCLTech shares were also up over 2% and Wipro shares rose over 1.3%.

Sensex, Nifty open in green as FIIs return on Dalal Street; IT stocks gainStock market opening on March 25: The S&P BSE Sensex gained over 350 points higher to open over 78,000, while the NSE Nifty50 gained nearly 100 points to trade above 23,750.

Sensex, Nifty set to extend rally: Key sectors to watch, strategies and risksStock market today: For those looking to invest, selective stock picking is key. With Nifty50 trading below its long-term valuation averages, investors may find value in largecap and midcap stocks.
Ola Electric shares to be in focus today. Here's whyIn an early morning exchange filing, Ola Electric Technologies announced that it has "amicably settled all outstanding dues" with Rosmerta Group.

Stocks to watch today: Ola Electric, Wipro, HCLTech, RVNL, Britannia and moreStocks to watch on March 25: With the stock market set to continue its positive run, here are the top stocks to watch out for during today's trading session.

Market opening predictions on March 25: What to expect from Sensex, Nifty todayForeign portfolio investors bought shares worth Rs 3,056 corer on Monday, marking their third consecutive day of buying. This trend has helped boost market confidence after a period of significant selling.

Samsung Electronics co-CEO Han Jong-hee dies of cardiac arrest at 63Samsung Electronics' co-CEO Han Jong-hee passed away at 63 due to cardiac arrest; he led the consumer electronics division and recently faced shareholder scrutiny over AI market struggles.

entertainment.headline: Singer Miley Cyrus announces new album Something Beautiful, shares artworkPop star Miley Cyrus has announced her upcoming album Something Beautiful. She shared a stunning artwork for the album along with a note about the project.

Farah Khan shares glimpse of Anil Kapoor's wife Sunita's grand midnight bashDirector Farah Khan shared a glimpse of Anil Kapoor's wife Sunita's midnight birthday celebrations. The star-studded guest list feature Chunky Pandey, Bhavana Pandey, Maheep Kapoor and others.

Chhorii 2 teaser: It is Nushrratt Bharuccha vs supernatural forces once againThe first promo of Nushrratt Bharuccha-starrer horror-thriller Chhorii 2 is here, and it promises a lot of thrills and chills for the fans of the horror genre.

Who's the real Sikandar? Aamir Khan-Salman Khan throw a curveball at AR MurugadossSalman Khan and Aamir Khan shared the teaser of their promotional video, also featuring Sikandar director AR Murugadoss. Check out the interesting video inside.

After Anirudh, composer Thaman to perform ahead of SRH vs LSG match in HyderabadComposer Thaman will be performing ahead of the SunRisers Hyderabad vs Lucknow Super Giants match in the ongoing Indian Premier League (IPL). He will be performing his hit numbers from Guntur Kaaram and other films.

Prithviraj Sukumaran shares update on Empuraan 3, confirms work has begunActor and director Prithviraj Sukumaran talked about the third part of 'Empuraan'. He spoke at a film event in Chennai and shared that the work on the third part has already begun.

Kalki Koechlin on producer's filler suggestion: I wanted to stab him with my forkIn a recent interview, actor Kalki Koechlin recalled a producer who suggested cosmetic fillers. She expressed her resolve to embrace her natural appearance despite such pressures.

Pawan Kalyan shares why he is not going to quit films anytime soonActor-politician Pawan Kalyan has no intention to quit movies anytime soon. The Deputy Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh shared that he doesn't want to quit acting for more reasons than one.

Actor Aasif Sheikh shares health update: I was brought to Mumbai in a wheelchairActor Aasif Sheikh shared his health update after reports of him collapsing on shooting sets emerged online. The actor stated that his sciatica pain worsened the situation.

Kunal Kamra case different, demolition of my home was illegal: Kangana RanautKangana Ranaut was referring to the demolition of her property in Pali Hill, Bandra, in September 2020, by the BMC on grounds of unauthorised construction.
Sunny Deol urges Bollywood to learn cinema from South: I shall go and settle thereActor Sunny Deol urged Bollywood producers to learn cinema from the South. He even hinted about settling there.

No cuts in Salman Khan's Sikandar, but changes in political scenes. Check run time'Sikandar' has been passed by the censor board without any cuts. The Salman Khan starrer is shorter than most of his other theatrical releases. Scroll down for details.

Rapper Travis Scott to make India debut with 'Circus Maximus World Tour' in DelhiAmerican rapper and singer-songwriter Travis Scott is set to make his India debut with the Circus Maximus World Tour. Scott will perform in New Delhi on October 18, 2025.
Amy Jackson, Ed Westwick welcome baby boy Oscar AlexanderAmy Jackson and Ed Westwick became parents to a baby boy. The new parents shared photos of their son and named him Oscar Alexander Westwick.

Priyanka kisses Nick onstage after Jonas Brothers New Jersey Hall of Fame debutPriyanka Chopra joined husband-singer Nick Jonas as the Jonas Brothers were honoured as the youngest inductees into the New Jersey Hall of Fame. Several videos and pictures from the event have gone viral.

Jennifer Aniston, Pedro Pascal's three-hour dinner date sparks relationship rumoursJennifer Aniston and Pedro Pascal were seen on a dinner date in West Hollywood. Their three-hour date has now fuelled speculations about a possible relationship or a collaboration.

K-pop group TWS announces 3rd mini album 'Try with us', to release in AprilTWS, the K-pop rising stars, are making a comeback with their third mini album, TRY WITH US. The album will be released on April 21.

Singer Neha Kakkar cries after late arrival to show. Fan yells 'very good acting'Playback singer Neha Kakkar broke down on stage after arriving three hours late to her Melbourne show. She apologised to the fans. However, some frustrated fans called it 'acting' and 'drama'.

Hansal Mehta recalls ordeal as he defends Kunal Kamra: My face was blackenedDirector Hansal Mehta extended his support to comedian Kunal Kamra. In a strong note on social media, Mehta recalled his past ordeal where he was assaulted and forced to apologise.

general news.headline: Action causes reaction: Eknath Shinde on Sena's rampage over Kunal Kamra jokeEknath Shinde's remarks came amid the ongoing controversy over stand-up comedian Kunal Kamra's latest video where he called the Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister a 'gaddar' (traitor) for his 2022 rebellion against Uddhav Thackeray.

Meerut rerun: UP woman kills husband with help of lover, contract killerThe woman, identified as Pragati Yadav, with the help of her lover and a contract killer, plotted murder of her husband in Uttar Pradesh's Mainpuri district, just two weeks after their marriage.

Bihar board class 12 result 2025 declared. Direct link here  Live UpdatesThe Bihar School Examination Board (BSEB) has announced the Class 12 results for 2025, bringing relief to lakhs of students. Candidates can now check their scores on the official website,

Is office coffee raising your cholesterol? Here's what you should knowA study found that coffee from common workplace machines contains higher levels of cholesterol-raising substances compared to regular filter coffee.

Coup in Bangladesh against Yunus? Army holds emergency meetingSince Muhammad Yunus took charge last year, there has been growing unrest and mistrust among the people in Bangladesh towards the government.

Has Trump triggered US brain drain, the biggest since World War II?The US might witness an exodus of researchers, if media reports and chatter on social media are anything to go by. The flight of scientists might be the biggest since scientists fled Nazi Germany. With President Donald Trump slashing research funding and increasing work visa scrutiny, European countries are planning to seize on the brain drain from the US.

Did you know Nasa intentionally crashed a spacecraft on the Moon in 1965?Before Neil Armstrong's legendary first steps on the Moon in 1969, Nasa had to ensure that the lunar surface was well-mapped and understood.

Bengaluru woman spikes husband's food with mother's help, kills him laterThe Bengaluru police arrested a realtor's wife and mother-in-law for his murder. Investigators say they spiked his food with sleeping pills, lured him to a secluded spot, and slit his throat.

Andhra resort politics: Jagan Reddy's party moves 38 corporators to BengaluruFearing defections, YSRCP has moved 38 Greater Visakhapatnam Municipal Corporation corporators to Bengaluru as a no-confidence motion looms over Visakhapatnam Mayor Golagani Hari Venkata Kumari. The NDA alliance, now holding a majority, aims to unseat her.

Delhi BJP MLAs demand closure of meat shops during Navratri, Congress MP backs callBJP leaders in Delhi and J&K have demanded the closure of meat shops during Navratri, citing Hindu sentiments, a move backed by Congress MP Imran Masood.

Actor, karate expert Shihan Hussaini dies in Chennai after battling blood cancerActor and Karate expert Shihan Hussaini died at a private hospital in Chennai on March 25. He was undergoing treatment for advanced blood cancer for the past few weeks.

Jagdeep Dhankhar calls all-party meet over cash recovery at Delhi judge's homeRajya Sabha chairman Jagdeep Dhankhar called for an all-party meeting today to discuss the issue of cash recovery at Delhi High Court judge Yashwant Varma's house.

Andhra man found dead in Texas a day after going missing, police suspect suicideA man from Andhra Pradesh's Krishna district was found dead in Texas a day after he went missing. Authorities suspect suicide, while his family raises funds to bring his body home.

MrBeast's reality show winner reveals how he's using Rs 86 crore prize moneyThe winner of MrBeast's reality show wasn't just playing for himself, he had a bigger purpose in mind. He revealed what he is going to do with his Rs 86 crore prize money.

China likely to, India has intent to interfere in elections: Canada spy agencyCanada is set to hold its general election on April 28 after newly appointed Prime Minister Mark Carney called for a snap poll. Ottawa has alleged that New Delhi may attempt to interfere in the elections, as relations between the two nations have hit an all-time low.

Snapchat texts reveal how Meerut woman manipulated lover into killing husbandMuskan and Sahil killed Saurabh on March 4, dismembered his body, stuffed the remains into a drum, and sealed it with cement. After committing the crime, the duo left for a vacation in Himachal Pradesh.

Men's jewellery is going beyond bracelets, brooches. Enter elaborate necklacesSuperstar Shah Rukh Khan is at the forefront of the trend. The actor has lately been flaunting a stunning collection of neckpieces, like a tennis necklace, a layered emerald haar, and polki jewels.

India slams Pakistan's repeated references at UN: Must vacate J&K territoryIndia firmly rejected Pakistan's claims at the United Nations, calling them "unwarranted and illegal", reiterating sovereignty over Jammu and Kashmir, and asking Islamabad to vacate occupied territories.

Kunal Kamra's stampede site as venue plan after rampage: Needs speedy demolitionComedian Kunal Kamra, in a lengthy post on X, quipped that for his next show, he might opt for a venue in need of speedy demolition.

sports.headline: Ashutosh Sharma credits Kevin Pietersen's advices for thrilling run chase vs LucknowDelhi Capitals batter Ashutosh Sharma credited head coach Kevin Pietersen's advices following his match-winning innings against Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) in Match 4 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Video: Boxer Saweety Boora assaults husband Deepak Hooda inside police stationIn a video that has gone viral, boxer Saweety Boora has been seen assaulting Kabaddi player Deepak Niwas Hooda inside a police station in Hisar, Haryana. The incident took place on March 15.

MS Dhoni defends Impact Player rule: High scores happening due to teams' mindsetLegendary Chennai Super Kings (CSK) wicketkeeper batter MS Dhoni shared his thoughts on the Impact Player Rule of the Indian Premier League and said that it's not solely responsible for the repeated high scores being seen in the tournament.

Iconic Gabba to be demolished after 2032 Olympics, Brisbane to get new stadiumThe iconic Gabba is all set to be demolished after the 2032 Olympics with Brisbane all set to get a new stadium. The new venue is set to be a 60,000-seater stadium.

GT vs PBKS Playing XI Prediction, IPL 2025: Shreyas Iyer's Punjab ready for new eraGujarat Titans and Punjab Kings are all set to lock horns in Mach 4 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) at the Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad. Both teams will be eager to get their campaign off to a winning start.

In Punjab Kings' new dawn, young Suryansh Shedge looks to make a mark in IPLPunjab Kings have bought a host of young Indian talent for IPL 2025, with Suryansh Shedge right at the thick of things. An ardent fan of Virat Kohli, the all-rounder told India Today in an exclusive interaction about his finishing skills, IPL 2025 goals and more.

What's your problem with MRF bats? Phillips on Gill Champions Trophy banterGlenn Phillips revealed the Champions Trophy banter he had with Shubman Gill ahead of Gujarat Titans' IPL 2025 opener against Punjab Kings on Tuesday, March 25. Gill will be aiming to lead GT to the playoffs this season.

Watch: Sanjiv Goenka engages in long discussion with Pant after Lucknow's lossLucknow Super Giants (LSG) owner Sanjiv Goenka was seen having a long discussion with captain Rishabh Pant and head coach Justin Langer following their loss against Delhi Capitals in Match 4 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

GT vs PBKS Match Preview: Gill, Gujarat look to take shine off new PunjabIPL 2025, Gujarat Titans vs Punjab Kings Match Preview: Shubman Gill and his rejuvenated Gujarat Titans side will be aiming to take the shine of the new-look Punjab Kings side as they face off at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad.

First impression: LSG's bowling frailties, captain Pant's blunders raise red flagsIPL 2025, DC vs LSG: Lucknow's depleted bowling unit captain Rishabh Pant's tactical errors cost them a winnable game in Vizag on Monday. If unaddressed, these flaws could make for a long and difficult IPL 2025 season.

LSG coach Lance Klusener on injury crisis: Have to mix and match till players returnLucknow Super Giants assistant coach Lance Klusener has said that the team will have to continue to 'mix and match' till the injury crisis subsides after their loss to Delhi Capitals on Monday, March 24. LSG are currently without their frontline pacers and have lost Mohsin Khan for the entire season.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
